title: Arabica Game
description:
In this fresh and innovative variation of the classic matchthree puzzle game, Arabica takes the user to an exciting and engaging new level of gameplay. The game can be played in two styles: Spread and Collect Gems. In Spread, collect gems in the central column, matching three or more gems of the same kind. In the latter mode, you need to arrange gems falling to the central column between other four columns, matching three or more gems of the same kind. While it may seem easy and simple at the first glance, Arabica is a game of wit and tactics that is beyond addictive.

Whether you want to take a quick break from your daily routine, or tour ancient Persia and be a part of a great love story, Arabica will have you coming back to play again and again.
Features

    * Unrestricted gameplay in Quick Play
    * 26 levels in the Story Mode
    * Two exciting game styles: Collect Gems and SpreadGems
    * 10 speed levels
    * 4 special gems for more challenge
    * Tranquil and original music

System Requirements:  	Windows ME/2000/XP/VISTA, 500MHz or faster CPU, 128MB RAM, 35MB Hard drive space (uncompressed), 3D accelerator card, Windows compatible sound card, DirectX 7.0 


Home Page: http://www.bigfishgames.com/download-games/1446/arabica/index.html
